Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.middleware

Class AlivenessHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.middleware.AlivenessHandler
  • public class AlivenessHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the utilities related to the monitoring of aliveness on the network.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean clientIsLive  
      private java.lang.Object liveLock  
      private int livenessRate  
      private Messenger messenger  
      private boolean monitoring  
      private View view  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AlivenessHandler​(Messenger messenger, View view)
      Constructs an instance of the aliveness handler used by an agent operating in the middleware.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) void pongHandler​(Message message)
      Accepts the pong message from the client and makes sure to acknowledge the aliveness of the sender.
      (package private) void registerDisconnection()
      First step of the disconnection procedure.
      (package private) void registerMessageFailure()
      Invoked when errors occur while sending a message via socket.
      protected void startMonitoringLiveness()
      Invoked when the agent needs to start monitoring the aliveness of the other side of the network.
      protected void startPing()
      Invoked when the agent needs to start signaling its aliveness status to the other side of the network.
      (package private) void stopMonitoringLiveness()
      Stops the monitoring process checking the aliveness of the other side of the connection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlivenessHandler

        public AlivenessHandler​(Messenger messenger,
                        View view)
        Constructs an instance of the aliveness handler used by an agent operating in the middleware.
        Parameters:
        messenger - a reference to the Messenger instance used by the agent.
        view - a reference to the view associated to the agent.

    • Method Detail

      • pongHandler

        void pongHandler​(Message message)
        Accepts the pong message from the client and makes sure to acknowledge the aliveness of the sender.
        Parameters:
        message - the "pong" message.

      • registerMessageFailure

        void registerMessageFailure()
        Invoked when errors occur while sending a message via socket. Starts the disconnection procedure.

      • startMonitoringLiveness

        protected void startMonitoringLiveness()
        Invoked when the agent needs to start monitoring the aliveness of the other side of the network.

      • registerDisconnection

        void registerDisconnection()
        First step of the disconnection procedure. Stops the monitoring process and informs the view about the disconnection.

      • stopMonitoringLiveness

        void stopMonitoringLiveness()
        Stops the monitoring process checking the aliveness of the other side of the connection.

      • startPing

        protected void startPing()
        Invoked when the agent needs to start signaling its aliveness status to the other side of the network.
